actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of the Army to provide technical assistance to local interests for planning the establishment of a regional water authority in northeastern Ohio.
subjects: Federal aid to water resources development

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to provide technical assistance to local interests for planning and establishing a regional water authority in northeastern Ohio which addresses the water problems of the region. Limits to 75 percent the Federal share of the cost of such activities.

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Army to provide technical assistance to local interests for planning the establishment of a regional water authority in northeastern Ohio.
